about_the_game:
Bloody Doctor is a single player Action RPG with isometric view which takes place in an old and fantasised steampunk Paris. Play a Doctor trying to find the cure of an overwhelming epidemic in a game with realistic graphics.





The world of Bloody Doctor is a dangerous one. The Doctor has two weapons in his possession: a medical weapon in his left hand and a destructive weapon in his right one. Which would you choose? Would you rather focus on finding the cure, extracting and experimenting on human organs? Then take advantage of your medical weapon in your left hand, so that you can harvest organs in good state, and then deliver the final blow to your opponent! You think that a dead person is a healed person? Then take advantage of your right Hand weapon and "heal" your opponents by taking their lives.



While extracting organs can be achieved during combat, the world of Bloody Doctor can be too dangerous to do so. Take a rest at your lab, extract by operating on corpses and make concoction. This will also allow you to become more powerful and to get specific skills.



Although the game is single player, your are not alone in Bloody Doctor. Team up with the Doctor and listen carefully to all the stories and anecdotes he tells you.



You will both meet NPCs and have to confront your former patients or people who do not want you to succeed in your quest. If a confrontation occurs, you will have to make a choice: preserve your opponent's health to harvest a rare organ by taking risks, or damage this potential loot by attacking him with your right hand weapon. The choices you make and the way you play will influence the Doctor's ability to evolve.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel I5 / AMD equivalent
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 MB available space

short_description: Bloody Doctor is an Action RPG. Control a Doctor facing an epidemic by extracting organs. Fight enemies and operate on corpses at your lab. Explore an old Steampunk Paris during a strange period.
